questions.question: What are you looking for?
questions.description: Get started by letting us know a little bit about what you need

questions.question: Please choose any one.
questions.description: The maximum tenure for LAP is 15 years, and for DOD, it is 10 years.

questions.question: How you'd like to proceed with your loan?
questions.description: Tell us if you’re applying for a fresh loan or want to consolidate your current loans—fully or partially—with or without extra borrowing. If you only want debt consolidation, you can enter zero as the additional funds, later.
state name
questions.question: Where your property is located ?
City name
If the residence location is the same as the property location?
questions.description: For an NRI applicant, this should be addressed from the perspective of the GPA (Power of Attorney).
state name
questions.question: Location for residence verification ?
city name

errorMessage.message: Kindly select a different city or update your earlier answer.

questions.question: If the registry has been done in the name of property owner(s)?

errorMessage.message: If the property hasn't been registered, a LAP is currently not feasible. To qualify for a LAP, the property must be registered in the name of the owner(s)

questions.question: Please confirm that the property is situated in officially authorized area by the government?
questions.description: Most lenders prefer that your property be approved by the respective city's "Development Authority" or "Municipal Corporation".

errorMessage.message: As your property is not as per map, only NBFC banks can approve your loan. You'll have to search which NBFC working in your location.

questions.question: If the construction of the property is as per "approved map" from the respective authority?
questions.description: Lenders can reject loan application if map is not approved by respective authority. Also construction of the property should be as per the approved map.

errorMessage.message: As your property is not as per map, only NBFC banks can approve your loan. You'll have to search which NBFC working in your location.

questions.question: If applicant or any of the co-applicants is NRI?
Please indicate the type of ownership for the property?
questions.description: Lenders need to ensure that the property meets legal requirements and compliances related to ownership rights, land tenure, and property transfer.

questions.question: Select the category of the property?
What type of construction is it?
What's the property's occupation type?

errorMessage.message:
We regret to inform you that we are unable to process your request at this time due to the following reason:
You have selected the construction type as 'Build-Up' and the property's occupation type as 'Vacant', which is not currently eligible for processing.

questions.question: Tell us who's applying
questions.description: The applicants whose names are on the property will be included in the loan, as well as those who wish to contribute to loan repayments.

questions.question: What's company type?
questions.description: Select the type of company who is applying for the loan. Be informed, the property should be in the name of company and not in the name of owner or director.

questions.question: How would you like to assess your company’s loan eligibility?
How many family members are applying for the loan?
questions.description: (including the primary applicant)

questions.question: What's the full name of the applicant ?
questions.description: How it appears on PAN, Passport, Aadhaar or Driving license.

questions.question: What's your employment status?
If the Provident Fund (PF) is being deducted from salary?(Optional)
questions.description: If PF is not deducted from your salary, your employer might not be registered with certain lenders. This could result in your loan being approved at a higher ROI. Don’t worry; we'll inform you of this before submitting your loan application to your chosen lender.

questions.question: What's the company name?
What is your current age? or years has your company been in business?
questions.description: It is required to assess your loan eligibility and tenure for the loan.

questions.question: What is the monthly gross income?
questions.description: Gross income is your total monthly earnings before deductions (tax, PF, NPS, etc) A few banks use it to assess your loan eligibility

questions.question: What is the monthly net income?
questions.description: Net income is your monthly earnings after deductions (tax, PF, NPS, etc) It is the amount you receive in your bank account as salary

errorMessage.message: Gross income should be greater than or equal to fixed salary

questions.question: What's the additional monthly income from bonuses, incentives, and rental earnings?
questions.description: This includes the average monthly bonus received in the latest financial year (total bonus divided by 12) and the average monthly incentive received in the latest 6 months (total incentive divided by 6). You will need to submit a valid rent agreement, and the rent amount should be reflected in your bank statement Enter zero (0) if there is no additional income

questions.question: Please select your profession
questions.description: Banks will require you to provide relevant certificates or degrees during the loan application process

questions.question: If Income Tax Returns are available for last three consecutive financial years?

errorMessage.message: We regret to inform you that we are currently unable to proceed with your request due to our service constraints.

questions.question: What were the Gross Receipts in the last three financial years?
What were the Net Profits for the last three financial years?
What's the Credit Score?
questions.description: The credit score is a crucial factor that lenders consider to determine your creditworthiness A higher credit score is essential for securing more favorable loan terms and interest rates, directly influencing loan eligibility and approval.

questions.question: Have you ever been defaulter

uiMeta.placeholder: Select the reason why you have low credit score

questions.question: What are the possible reasons behind your low CIBIL score?
questions.description: select all the applicable reasons to help us understand what may be impacting your credit score

options.label: Frequent use of full credit limit
options.value: Frequent use of full credit limit

options.label: Minimum due payments only on credit card
options.value: Minimum due payments only on credit card

questions.question: What type of existing loan do you have?
questions.description: Select the type of loan you currently have. This helps us understand your existing financial commitments better.

questions.question: Which bank is your existing loan with?
questions.description: Choose the bank where you have your current loan. This information helps us coordinate the loan takeover process if needed.

uiMeta.placeholder: How do you plan to close this loan?

questions.question: How would you like to handle this existing loan?
questions.description: Let us know if you'll close this loan yourself or if you'd like us to help with the closure process as part of your new loan.

options.label: will be closed by this loan
options.value: will be closed by this loan

errorMessage.message: Please select a different reason for the closure plan. You have currently chosen “New Loan” as the reason. However, if your intention is to close this existing loan by consolidating it with a new debt consolidation loan, you need to go back and select the debt consolidation option instead. This is necessary because only the debt consolidation option allows you to close existing loans through this process.

==: will be closed by this loan

questions.question: What is the EMI for this existing loan?
questions.description: EMI (monthly)

total limit
sanctioned limit (at the time of start)
remaining limit (current)
sanctioned tenure
remaining tenure
utilized amount
interest rate (p.a.)
How long would you like your loan term to be?
questions.description: Choose your preferred loan duration. A longer term means lower monthly payments but more interest over time. You can adjust this later based on your eligibility.

questions.question: Do you have a specific loan amount in mind?
questions.description: Let us know if you have a particular loan amount requirement. This helps us tailor our offerings to your needs.

questions.question: Enter your desired loan amount
questions.description: You can request a loan amount up to ₹1,39,15,400. Enter a value that aligns with your requirements and repayment capacity.
